mapper.select: SELECT c.*, d.id AS detail_id, d.contract_id AS detail_contract_id, d.title AS detail_title, d.brief AS detail_brief, d.description AS detail_description, d.icon AS detail_icon, d.created_at AS detail_created_at, d.updated_at AS detail_updated_at FROM contracts c LEFT OUTER JOIN contract_details d ON c.id = d.contract_id WHERE c.sn = #{sn}
